booking_appointments.title: Booking appointments
booking_appointments.description: Reserve pantry visits from your dashboard.
steps: Select a time and confirm the booking.

rescheduling_or_canceling.title: Rescheduling or canceling
rescheduling_or_canceling.description: Change or cancel an existing booking.
steps: Click Reschedule or Cancel and follow prompts.

view_booking_history.title: View booking history
steps: Browse the list of previous and upcoming bookings.

manage_profile_and_password.title: Manage profile and password
manage_profile_and_password.description: Update contact information or change your password.

visit_counts_and_reminders.title: Visit counts and reminders
visit_counts_and_reminders.description: The dashboard shows monthly totals and upcoming reminders.

no_slots_available: No slots available. Please choose another date.
setup_link_sent: If the account exists, a setup link has been sent.
reset_link_sent: If the account exists, a reset link has been sent.

profile_page.title: MJ Foodbank - User Profile
profile_page.name: Name:
profile_page.phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
profile_page.phone_chars: Use only numbers, spaces, or dashes.
profile_page.password_requirements: Use at least 8 characters, including a number and a symbol.
profile_page.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.

cancel_booking_question: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
cancel_all_upcoming: Cancel all upcoming bookings in this series?
tooltip_schedule_legend: Colored cells indicate booking status. Click an available cell to create a booking.
tooltip_assigned_clients: Shows assigned clients and their public IDs.
tooltip_next_visit_details: See details of your next visit
tooltip_agency_schedule: Green cells show available spots. Gray cells are full or unavailable.
tooltip_cancel_24hr: Cancel at least 24 hours before the booking to avoid a no-show.
tooltip_select_slot_request: Select a slot above, then click Request shift to book it.
tooltip_block_slots: Block slots for a date or recurring schedule
tooltip_recurring_day_of_week: Day of week for the recurring block
tooltip_recurring_week_of_month: Week of month for the recurring block
tooltip_slot_blocked_on_date: Slot blocked on the selected date or schedule
tooltip_break_repeats: Break repeats on this day each week
tooltip_slot_unavailable_break: Slot unavailable during the break each week
tooltip_pantry_schedule_legend: Green = approved, red = no-show, dark green = visited.
tooltip_assign_user_new_client: Books a visitor not yet in the system
tooltip_volunteer_schedule: Green cells show your bookings, gray cells are filled. Click 'Volunteer Needed' to book.
tooltip_volunteer_stats: Hours and shifts count only completed shifts. Streak shows consecutive weeks volunteering.
search_by_name_or_client_id: Search by name or client ID
